---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.1.1
Date: 2021-07-23
  Changes:
    - Added stacked "atomic-bomb" as requested
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.1.0
Date: 2020-11-25
  Changes:
    - Added support for 1.1.0
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.4
Date: 2020-10-14
  Changes:
    - Added stacked nuclear-fuel
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.3
Date: 2020-09-10
  Changes:
    - Added Spidertron parts as an opt in setting.  This stacks rocket-lauchers, fustion reactors and exo-legs.   Stacking of spidertron itself is blocked by a limitation of deadlock loaders internal checks
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.2
Date: 2020-09-09
  Changes:
    - Added Radar,  so that stacked Satellites can be made if your want
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.1
Date: 2020-08-26
  Changes:
    - Added on_configuration_changed function to check recipes are enabled after mod upgrades or setting changes
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.0
Date: 2020-08-24
  Changes:
    - Roll to v1.0.0 to match game
    - Made rusty-locale an external dependecy
    - Added Stacked Rocket-Parts, Satellites & Fish
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.8
Date: 4-Jun-2020
  Changes:
    - Added some logic so I could exclude vanila items being stacked if another mod was doing something with it .. eg Krastorio2
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.7
Date: 4-Jun-2020
  Changes:
    - Added New icons from 0.18.30
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.6
Date: 2-Jun-2020
  Changes:
    - Added New icons from 0.18.29
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.5
Date: 29-May-2020
  Changes:
    - Dont stack space science if Space Exploration startup key "se-space-science-pack" is set to
      "Remove" or "Replace"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.4
Date: 27-May-2020
  Changes:
    - Update for 0.18.27 graphics
